<voice 00135_00057534><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001><pc> I heard what you just

<voice 00390_00057535><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Tell me more, Uncle. Where the hell

57536.<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00510_00057536><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>Oh, yeah? He was just at the tavern

57537.<voice 00660_00057537><start_lip_sync n0:

57538.<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00790_00057538><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Thanks. Now I can curse that phony

57539.<voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00900_00057539><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>By the way, what kind of leaf is that?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57540.<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00960_00057540><start_lip_sync n02172 _normal m00001>Oh, this one is called Softwort! Even

57541.<voice 01040_00057541><start_lip_sync n0:

57542.<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01135_00057542><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I'm going to Rinja Tower to track down

57544.<voice 00345_00057544><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00345_00057544><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001><pc> This way.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57549.<voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01415_00057549><start_lip_sync n02091 _normal m00001>How's the plan coming along?<stop_lip_animation n02091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57550.<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01470_00057550><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>The townsfolk are completely in

57551.<voice 01520_00057551><start_lip_sync n0:
If the adults of the town pray to this statue, the power of their prayers will completely erode the Town of
Celed into a false world.

57552.<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01550_00057552><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>They're so sure of me that they don't

Cooke.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57554.<voice 01831_00057554><start_lip_sync n0:
It belonged to a little human girl who was trying to jam me up, and it says everything about the false, angry

57555.<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01890_00057555><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I took it from her just in case, but I

57561.<voice 02846_00057561><start_lip_sync n0:

81793.集会所の中は 安らぐ香りで\n満たされている……。:
The assembly hall is filled with a
soothing aroma.

57567.<voice 00250_00057567><start_lip_sync n0:
Ladies and gentlemen. Since then, I have been on a journey to find a way to save this town. Please take a look
at this Prayer Statue.

57568.<voice 00526_00057568><start_lip_sync n0:
To call the spirits to listen to us, we need the power of prayer. Pray to this Prayer Statue to build up your
power.

57569.<voice 00588_00057569><start_lip_sync n0:
If the statue is filled with the power of prayer, it will extinguish the resentment of those children who have
turned into evil spirits and bring them back to this place.

81794.<voice 00628_00081794><start_lip_sync n0:
Come, let us bow down to this image and pray! And ask forgiveness from the spirits of the children you have
called forth, and you will be saved!

81795.<voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00758_00081795><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Please forgive me.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

81796.<voice 00848_00081796><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00848_00081796><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>I'm sorry for being a bad parent.<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>

81797.<voice 00888_00081797><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00888_00081797><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>Forget about us. Rest in peace.<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01464_00057576><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>The Town of Celed will be invaded by a

81798.<voice 01504_00081798><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01504_00081798><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Perish by your own prayer, not knowing

<voice 00230_00057612><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I'm sorry, Dad. I lied about the

57618.<voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01550_00057618><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>What the hell is this?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 01590_00057619><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Sadak was also telling the truth. He

57620.<voice 01605_00057620><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 03199_00057623><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Liselotte You've been waiting for us

Ever since I lost you, I've been brooding alone. I have wondered if my strict discipline had driven you into

57625.<voice 03265_00057625><start_lip_sync n0:

57630.<voice 04085_00057630><start_lip_sync n0:

57631.<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04135_00057631><start_lip_sync n02046 _normal m00001>We don't think we were cornered by
